description: B2B fiber optic cable assembly e-commerce platform with AI-powered plan analysis

user_stories.title: Design System Foundation
user_stories.description: Build comprehensive design system with all UI primitives: Button, Card, Badge, Input, Dialog, Dropdown, Select, Tabs, Accordion, Tooltip. All components must support dark theme, be accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA), and have Storybook-quality documentation via tests.
acceptance_criteria: All 10 UI components implemented with variants

user_stories.title: Responsive Header & Navigation
user_stories.description: Production-ready header with mega-menu for Products and Solutions, mobile hamburger nav with animated transitions, search trigger (⌘K), and sticky positioning with backdrop blur.
acceptance_criteria: Mega-menu shows product categories with icons and descriptions
Mobile nav with Framer Motion slide animation
Sticky header with backdrop blur on scroll
Tests for navigation rendering and mobile toggle

user_stories.title: Homepage — Award-Winning Design
user_stories.description: Complete homepage with hero, trust bar, product categories grid, AI plan analysis feature section, value propositions, and CTA. Must be visually stunning, fast-loading, and fully responsive.
acceptance_criteria: Hero with gradient background, animated badge, and dual CTAs
6 product category cards with hover effects
AI plan analysis feature section with stats preview

user_stories.title: Product Listing Page with Mock Data
user_stories.description: Product catalog page with grid/list view, category filtering sidebar, sort options, and product cards. Use mock data (20 products) until BigCommerce integration.
acceptance_criteria: Product cards with image, name, price, specs badges, stock status
Left sidebar with filter groups (fiber type, connector, category, price range)
Mock data with 20 realistic fiber optic products
Tests for filtering and sorting logic

user_stories.title: Product Detail Page
user_stories.description: Full product detail page with image gallery, specs table, pricing, stock status, related products, and CTA to configure similar cable.
acceptance_criteria: Price display with stock status and lead time
Add to cart / Request quote buttons
Tests for page rendering with mock data

user_stories.title: Configurator — Step 1-2: Application & Fiber Type
user_stories.description: First two steps of the cable assembly configurator with full selection UI, animated transitions, and configuration state management.
acceptance_criteria: Application selection grid (6 options with icons and descriptions)
Fiber type selection with color indicators and specs
Step progress indicator with completed state
Tests for state management and step navigation

user_stories.title: Configurator — Steps 3-4: Connector Selection
user_stories.description: Connector A and B selection with compatibility filtering. Connector B options filter based on Connector A selection and fiber type.
acceptance_criteria: Connector selection grid with connector images/icons
Polish type selection (UPC/APC) for applicable connectors
Compatibility filtering: Connector B filters based on A + fiber type
Incompatible options shown as disabled with tooltip explanation

user_stories.title: Configurator — Step 5: Cable Specifications
user_stories.description: Cable specification step with length input, jacket type selection, color picker, and fiber count selector.
acceptance_criteria: Jacket type selection (PVC, LSZH, Plenum, Armored) with descriptions
Color picker with standard cable colors
Validation: min/max length per jacket type

user_stories.title: Configurator — Step 6: Review & SVG Preview
user_stories.description: Review step with animated 2D SVG cable preview, full configuration summary, and pricing placeholder.
acceptance_criteria: Animated SVG cable diagram showing connectors, cable, and specs
SVG updates dynamically based on configuration (colors, connector shapes)
Add to cart / Request quote CTAs
Tests for SVG rendering and summary display

user_stories.title: Configurator — Pricing Engine
user_stories.description: Real-time pricing engine that calculates cable assembly price based on configuration. Uses rule-based pricing with volume breaks.
acceptance_criteria: Base price per fiber type + connector combination
Jacket type surcharge (Armored > Plenum > LSZH > PVC)
Lead time estimation based on complexity
Tests for pricing calculations with known inputs/outputs

user_stories.title: AI Plan Upload — File Handling
user_stories.description: Robust file upload system with drag-and-drop, file type validation, multi-file support, and upload progress tracking.
acceptance_criteria: File type validation (PDF, DWG, DXF, PNG, JPG, XLSX, CSV, VSDX, DOCX, PPTX)
File size validation (max 50MB per file, 200MB total)
Multi-file upload with individual progress bars

user_stories.title: AI Plan Analysis — Claude Vision Integration
user_stories.description: Backend API that sends uploaded files to Claude Vision for analysis. Extracts fiber connection requirements from plans and returns structured data.
acceptance_criteria: File preprocessing: PDF to images, CAD to images
Claude Vision API call with structured prompt
Returns: connections list, zones, quantities, fiber types, lengths
Rate limiting (max 10 analyses per hour per IP)

user_stories.title: AI Plan Analysis — Results UI
user_stories.description: Interactive results display showing AI analysis with editable quantities, zone breakdown, and quote generation.
acceptance_criteria: Summary stats cards (total connections, zones, estimated total)
Inline editing of fiber type, connectors, length

user_stories.title: Customer Portal — Account Dashboard
user_stories.description: Customer account dashboard with order history, quote management, saved configurations, and account settings.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard with recent orders, pending quotes, saved configs summary
Order history with status badges and tracking links
Quote list with status (draft, pending, approved, expired)

user_stories.title: Algolia Search Integration
user_stories.description: Full Algolia search with instant results, faceted filtering, and typo tolerance across the product catalog.
acceptance_criteria: Faceted filters: fiber type, connector, category, price, certification

user_stories.title: Programmatic SEO Pages
user_stories.description: Auto-generated product pages for every cable configuration combination. Template-based with dynamic content.
acceptance_criteria: Generate pages for top 100 configurations initially
Each page has: specs, price, configurator CTA, related, FAQ schema

user_stories.title: Solutions Pages by Industry
user_stories.description: Industry-specific solution pages for Data Centers, 5G, FTTH, Enterprise, and Industrial with targeted content and product recommendations.
acceptance_criteria: 5 industry pages with unique hero, challenges, solutions, product recs
Each page: hero image, industry overview, key challenges, Nexlume solutions
CTA to configurator pre-filtered by industry

user_stories.title: Technical Resources Library
user_stories.description: Resource center with application guides, datasheets, installation videos, and compatibility tools.
acceptance_criteria: Resource listing with category filters (guides, datasheets, videos, tools)
Resource detail page with content + related resources

user_stories.title: BigCommerce B2B API Integration
user_stories.description: Core BigCommerce integration: product catalog sync, cart management, and checkout flow via GraphQL Storefront API.
acceptance_criteria: Product detail query with variants and images
Checkout redirect to BigCommerce hosted checkout
Environment variables for store hash and tokens

user_stories.title: QuickBooks Integration via n8n
user_stories.description: Order and inventory sync between BigCommerce and QuickBooks Enterprise via n8n workflows.
acceptance_criteria: n8n workflow: BigCommerce order webhook → QuickBooks invoice creation
n8n workflow: QuickBooks inventory levels → BigCommerce stock update (every 15 min)
Manual sync trigger for initial load
